content: On this side, you'll find a few fallen trees creating makeshift bridges above the brook below, and one of them has another green Wisp to absorb along the tree, while the other has a green Wisp on top of a giant rock.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
On this side, you'll find a few fallen trees creating makeshift bridges above the brook below, and one of them has another green Wisp to absorb along the tree, while the other has a green Wisp on top of a giant rock.
